critique: The executive order aims to convey a sense of urgency and resolve in addressing labor disturbances that threaten the war effort. It seeks to instill confidence that the government is taking necessary steps to maintain essential operations. The order does not want to convey joy. It wants to convey a sense of fear that the war effort will be impeded. It also wants to convey a sense of disgust that labor disturbances are interrupting operations. It wants to convey a sense of surprise that the government is taking control of private companies.
